bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [Converter] Support dynamic cap negotiation between pause-start
bug.description:
Run a pipeline. Pause a piprline (e.g., stop button of pipeviz) Motify capsfilter before tensor_converter Restart the pipeline
<denchmark-code>ERROR:/source/AutoDrv/NNStreamer/gst/tensor_converter/tensor_converter.c:586:gst_tensor_converter_chain: assertion failed: (self->tensor_configured) Aborted (core dumped) ``` </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/941>#941</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
assertion in _chain() function, it doesn't get tensor info. maybe called gst_tensor_converter_change_state() and then resets configured tensor info.

In tensor-converter gst_tensor_converter_parse_caps() Remove self->tensor_info = config.info; in the last. This line updates the property 'input-dim' and makes error when doing caps-negotiation. I will make a PR for this after changing nnstreamer directory structure.
